PKGMAN-UNLOCK(8) System Manager's Manual PKGMAN-UNLOCK(8)

NAME

pkgman-unlock — unlock the package(s)

SYNOPSIS

pkgman unlock pkgname ...

DESCRIPTION

Remove lock from specified packages. They will be available for updating in pkgman-sysup(8) operation.

FILES

/var/lib/pkg/locked
Database of locked packages.

EXIT STATUS

0 if successfully unlocked, 255 otherwise.

September 9, 2023 Zeppe-Lin
